answers.answer: Hello,Generally the term "thyroidism" is linked to a prefix of hyper- or hypo-. I have not come across the term "thyroidism" alone in Endocrine practice. Type 1 diabetes is linked to other autoimmune types of thyroid disease, but Type 2 is not linked to those in that way.Hope this answers your question.

question: My endocrinologist mentioned Type 2 diabetes can cause thyroidism. Now he doesn't want to discuss itanymore. Is there any truth to it?Thank you,Tissue
title: What is Thyroidism?
